apple_vendor_description: This Apple-designed emoji portrays a loving couple, a man with a medium-dark skin tone and a woman with a medium-light skin tone, embracing with a heart between them. The realistic lighting and smooth gradients on their figures, combined with the glossy red heart, create a warm and affectionate visual. The soft, rounded edges of their forms enhance the tender intimacy of the scene, perfectly symbolizing a romantic union and deep affection on Apple devices.
